Incarnate {3}{G}{W} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Vigilance
Whenever Become What Always Was attacks, you may cast an unincarnated copy of it. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
